title: Apps
description: 24 specialized AI tools for architectural visualization. Quick tools for specific tasks.

body.raw:
# Apps

24 specialized tools for quick, focused tasks. No prompts needed—just upload and go.

## Render Transformations

### [Render to Section Drawing](/apps/ai-architectural-section-drawing-tool)

Convert renders to technical CAD sections, 3D cross-sections, or illustrated 2D drawings with text control and style references for construction docs.

**What it does**: Transforms photorealistic renders into precise technical section drawings showing all structural elements, materials, and dimensions with architectural drafting standards.

**Use for**: Construction documentation, technical drawings, section views, permit applications

### [Render to CAD](/apps/convert-render-to-cad-drawing-tool)

Generate floor plans, elevations, and sections in batch with CAD linework, dimensions, and annotations for permit applications and construction docs.

**What it does**: Converts photorealistic renders into clean 2D CAD-style technical drawings with precise linework, dimensions, and architectural annotations.

**Use for**: Permit applications, construction documentation, technical drawings, CAD conversion

### [Render Upscale](/apps/ai-render-upscaler-architectural-enhancement)

Upscale renders 2x, 4x, or 8x with AI enhancement, sharpening edges, refining textures, and maintaining architectural accuracy for print-ready quality.

**What it does**: Increases render resolution while maintaining quality, detail, and architectural accuracy. Perfect for print-ready outputs.

**Use for**: Print-ready quality, high-resolution outputs, detail enhancement, large format printing

### [Render Effects](/apps/architectural-render-effects-stylization-tool)

Apply sketch, illustration, wireframe, watercolor, or pencil effects with adjustable intensity while preserving architectural proportions and design intent.

**What it does**: Adds creative effects to renders while maintaining architectural accuracy and design intent. Transform realistic renders into artistic styles.

**Use for**: Artistic presentations, style variations, creative effects, portfolio diversity

## Floor Plan Tools

### [Empty Floorplan to Furnished](/apps/ai-floor-plan-furniture-placement-tool)

Add modern, traditional, minimalist, or luxury furniture to floor plans with proper scale, room-specific layouts, and CAD-style technical drawing quality.

**What it does**: Adds appropriate furniture and interior elements to floor plans in CAD architectural style, maintaining scale and proportions, showing furniture layout, fixtures, and spatial organization.

**Use for**: Interior planning, furniture placement, space visualization, design development

### [Floorplan to 3D Model](/apps/convert-2d-floor-plan-to-3d-diagram)

Transform 2D plans into isometric, axonometric, or oblique 3D diagrams with adjustable wall heights (2.4m-3.6m) and technical accuracy.

**What it does**: Transforms 2D floor plans into professional 3D axonometric diagrams showing spatial relationships, volumes, and architectural elements with proper perspective and technical accuracy.

**Use for**: 3D visualization, spatial understanding, client presentations, design communication

### [Floorplan Technical Diagrams](/apps/floor-plan-technical-diagram-generator)

Create technical diagrams with minimal, standard, or detailed annotations, optional dimensions, room labels, and architectural symbols for documentation.

**What it does**: Converts floor plans into professional technical architectural diagrams with proper annotations, dimensions, room labels, and architectural standards.

**Use for**: Documentation, technical drawings, architectural standards, construction docs

## Diagram & Visualization

### [Exploded Diagram](/apps/architectural-exploded-diagram-generator)

Generate exploded axonometric views with tight, medium, or wide component spacing in vertical, horizontal, or diagonal orientations for assembly visualization.

**What it does**: Creates exploded axonometric diagrams from architectural designs, showing all components separated with proper spacing, maintaining architectural accuracy and technical drawing standards.

**Use for**: Assembly visualization, component breakdown, technical documentation, design explanation

### [Multi Angle View](/apps/multi-angle-architectural-view-generator)

Generate 2, 4, or 6 consistent camera angles (aerial, eye-level, or mixed) with matching lighting and materials for comprehensive design visualization.

**What it does**: Generates multiple camera angle views of architectural designs, showing different perspectives (aerial, eye-level, close-up) with consistent lighting and materials.

**Use for**: Comprehensive views, multiple perspectives, design review, client presentations

## Material & Texture

### [Change Texture](/apps/ai-interior-texture-material-replacement)

Replace interior materials with wood, stone, metal, fabric, concrete, marble, tile, or plaster with subtle, medium, or strong intensity and lighting control.

**What it does**: Modifies textures and materials in interior spaces while maintaining lighting, proportions, and spatial relationships. Applies material changes with photorealistic accuracy.

**Use for**: Material exploration, interior design, texture testing, design options

### [Material Alteration](/apps/material-alteration)

Replace facade materials with brick, glass, concrete, metal, wood, stone, or composite with matte, glossy, textured, or satin finishes while preserving structure.

**What it does**: Alters building materials and facade finishes in architectural renders, replacing specified materials while maintaining structural integrity, lighting, and architectural proportions.

**Use for**: Facade design, material testing, building exterior options, design exploration

### [Change Lighting](/apps/interior-lighting-simulation-change-tool)

Transform interior lighting with natural, warm, cool, dramatic, soft, or studio styles for day, sunset, night, dawn, or golden hour while preserving materials.

**What it does**: Modifies lighting conditions in interior spaces, adjusting natural and artificial light sources to create the specified ambiance while maintaining material accuracy and spatial relationships.

**Use for**: Lighting design, ambiance testing, mood variations, time-of-day visualization

## Interior Design

### [Upholstery Change](/apps/furniture-upholstery-fabric-replacement-tool)

Replace furniture upholstery with leather, fabric, velvet, linen, suede, or canvas in solid, striped, geometric, floral, or abstract patterns while maintaining form.

**What it does**: Changes upholstery patterns and materials on furniture in interior renders, applying specified fabric, pattern, and color while maintaining furniture form and lighting.

**Use for**: Furniture design, fabric selection, interior styling, material options

### [Product Placement](/apps/ai-product-placement-interior-visualization)

Place products into scenes with natural, prominent, or subtle positioning, auto/preserve/fit scale adjustment, and optional lighting matching for realistic integration.

**What it does**: Places specified products into interior scenes with proper scale, lighting, shadows, and perspective, making them appear naturally integrated into the space.

**Use for**: Product visualization, interior staging, marketing materials, furniture placement

### [Item Change](/apps/interior-item-replacement-swap-tool)

Replace furniture, decor, fixtures, or artwork with style-matched, contrasting, or neutral alternatives while preserving or adjusting scale and lighting.

**What it does**: Replaces specified items in interior spaces with alternative options, maintaining scale, lighting, shadows, and spatial relationships.

**Use for**: Interior variations, furniture swapping, design options, style exploration

### [Moodboard to Render](/apps/convert-moodboard-to-interior-render-ai)

Convert moodboards into cohesive, eclectic, minimalist, or maximalist interior renders for living, bedroom, kitchen, office, dining, or bathroom with concept to complete detail.

**What it does**: Transforms moodboards into photorealistic interior renders that capture the mood, color palette, materials, and aesthetic of the moodboard while creating a cohesive, realistic space.

**Use for**: Concept visualization, design development, client presentations, moodboard realization

## 3D & Model

### [3D to Render](/apps/convert-3d-model-to-photorealistic-render)

Convert 3D model screenshots to photorealistic renders with natural/dramatic/soft/studio lighting, urban/natural/minimal environments, and eye-level/aerial/low-angle/close-up cameras.

**What it does**: Transforms 3D models into photorealistic architectural renders with realistic materials, lighting, environment, and camera composition suitable for presentation.

**Use for**: Model visualization, presentation renders, realistic outputs, client presentations

### [Sketch to Render](/apps/convert-architectural-sketch-to-render-ai)

Transform sketches to photorealistic renders with preserve/enhance/transform style options and sunny/overcast/sunset/night environments while maintaining design intent.

**What it does**: Transforms architectural sketches into photorealistic renders, maintaining design intent, proportions, and key elements while adding realistic materials, lighting, and environmental context.

**Use for**: Concept development, hand drawing visualization, design iteration, sketch realization

## Presentation & Portfolio

### [Presentation Board Maker](/apps/architectural-presentation-board-maker-tool)

Create A3/A2/A1/A0 presentation boards with grid/masonry/linear/asymmetric/magazine layouts, light/dark/neutral/custom colors, and optional annotations for client meetings.

**What it does**: Creates professional architectural presentation board layouts with proper visual hierarchy, spacing, annotations, and design elements suitable for client presentations or portfolio display.

**Use for**: Client meetings, design reviews, portfolio boards, project presentations

### [Portfolio Layout Generator](/apps/architect-portfolio-layout-generator-tool)

Generate portfolio layouts with grid/masonry/linear/magazine/editorial styles, light/dark/neutral/minimal colors, minimal/elegant/bold typography, and balanced/large/small image emphasis.

**What it does**: Generates professional architectural portfolio layouts that showcase project images with proper typography, spacing, visual hierarchy, and design elements suitable for online or print portfolios.

**Use for**: Online portfolios, print portfolios, project showcases, professional presentation

### [Presentation Sequence Creator](/apps/presentation-sequence-creator)

Create linear/comparison/progressive/narrative sequences with horizontal/vertical/diagonal flow, smooth/clear/dramatic transitions, and minimal/detailed/no annotations for storytelling.

**What it does**: Creates sequential presentation layouts that tell a visual story with architectural images, arranging them in a logical flow with proper transitions, annotations, and narrative structure for client presentations.

**Use for**: Design storytelling, client presentations, design evolution, narrative visualization

## Video Generation

### [Render to Video](/apps/animate-architectural-render-to-video-ai)

Animate architectural renders with smooth, cinematic motion. Create walkthrough videos, time-lapses, and dynamic presentations with camera movements, lighting changes, and environmental effects.

**What it does**: Animates architectural renders with smooth, cinematic motion. Creates professional walkthrough videos with appropriate camera movements, lighting transitions, and environmental effects that showcase the architectural space.

**Use for**: Walkthroughs, animated presentations, marketing videos, dynamic visualization

### [Text to Video Walkthrough](/apps/ai-architectural-walkthrough-video-generator)

Generate architectural walkthrough videos from text descriptions. Create virtual property tours, construction sequences, design presentations, and marketing videos with synchronized audio.

**What it does**: Generates professional architectural walkthrough videos based on descriptions. Creates cinematic videos that showcase architectural spaces with appropriate camera movements, lighting, and environmental details.

**Use for**: Virtual tours, marketing videos, design presentations, property visualization

### [Keyframe Sequence Video](/apps/architectural-keyframe-sequence-video-tool)

Create smooth video transitions between multiple keyframe images (2-3 images). Perfect for showing design evolution, before/after sequences, and design variations with seamless transitions.

**What it does**: Creates smooth video transitions between keyframe images, showing seamless progression that maintains architectural accuracy and visual continuity.

**Use for**: Before/after sequences, design evolution, transition videos, variation visualization

## How to Use Apps

1. Go to [Apps](/apps)
2. Browse or search for a tool
3. Click on the tool name or use the links above
4. Upload your image(s)
5. Configure settings (if needed)
6. Click **Generate**
7. Download or iterate

## Tips

**Choose the right tool**:
- Match tool to your task
- Read tool descriptions above
- Check input requirements (single image, multiple images, or image+text)

**Prepare your images**:
- Use clear, high-quality images
- Match tool requirements
- Check file formats (JPG, PNG, WebP)

**Iterate**:
- Try different settings
- Compare results
- Refine inputs

## Next Steps

- [Unified Chat Interface](/docs/unified-chat-interface) — Chat-based rendering
- [Node Editor](/docs/node-editor) — Complex workflows
- [Creating Your First Project](/docs/creating-your-first-project) — Get started
